org.locationtech.geowave.core.cli.operations.config.options

Class ConfigOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.cli.operations.config.options.ConfigOptions

  • public class ConfigOptions
extends Object
    Config options allows the user to override the default location for configuration options, and also allows commands to load the properties needed for running the program.

      • getDefaultPropertyFile

        public static File getDefaultPropertyFile()
        The default property file is in the user's home directory, in the .geowave folder. If the version can not be found the first available property file in the folder is used
        Returns:
        Default Property File

        Returns:
        true if success, false if failure

      • loadProperties

        public static Properties loadProperties(File configFile)
        This helper function will load the properties file, or return null if it can't. It's designed to be used by other commands.
        Parameters:
        delimiter -

      • loadProperties

        public static Properties loadProperties(File configFile,
                                        String pattern)
        This helper function will load the properties file, or return null if it can't. It's designed to be used by other commands.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - the delimiter
        pattern - filter by a regex pattern
